verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> that Abraham <S%G11><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> forefather <S%G3962><s%>, hath found <S%G2147><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> was justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, he hath <S%G2192><s%> whereof to glory <S%G2745><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the scripture <S%G1161><s%>? And Abraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that worketh <S%G2038><s%>, the reward <S%G3408><s%> is <S%G3049><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> reckoned <S%G3049><s%> as of <S%G2596><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as of <S%G2596><s%> debt <S%G3783><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to him that worketh <S%G2038><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him that justifieth <S%G1344><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is reckoned <S%G3049><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Even as <S%G2509><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> pronounceth <S%G3004><s%> blessing <S%G3108><s%> upon the man <S%G444><s%>, unto whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> reckoneth <S%G3049><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from works <S%G2041><s%>,
saying <S%G3107><s%>, Blessed are they whose <S%G3739><s%> iniquities <S%G458><s%> are forgiven <S%G863><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> are covered <S%G1943><s%>.
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%>, the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will3049, 3756 not <S%G3361><s%> reckon <S%G3049><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

Is this <S%G3778><s%> blessing <S%G3108><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> pronounced upon <S%G1909><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%>, To Abraham11, 3754 his faith <S%G4102><s%> was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> was it <S%G3049><s%> reckoned <S%G3049><s%>? when he was <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>? Not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he received <S%G2983><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, a seal <S%G4973><s%> of the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> he had while he was in <S%G1722><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> them that believe <S%G4100><s%>, though they be <S%G1223><s%> in uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> might be reckoned <S%G3049><s%> unto <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G846><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of circumcision <S%G4061><s%> to them who not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> who <S%G4748><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> in the steps <S%G2487><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> that faith <S%G4102><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> he had in uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> was the promise <S%G1860><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to <S%G4690><s%> his <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> they that are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> are heirs <S%G2818><s%>, faith <S%G4102><s%> is made void <S%G2758><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> is made of none effect <S%G2673><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>; but <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> law <S%G3551><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> is there transgression <S%G3847><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause it is of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it may be according <S%G2596><s%> to grace <S%G5485><s%>; to the end <S%G1519><s%> that the promise <S%G1860><s%> may be <S%G1511><s%> sure <S%G949><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> to that <S%G3588><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to that <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G3754><s%> (as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, A father <S%G3962><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> have I made <S%G5087><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>) before <S%G2713><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> he believed <S%G4100><s%>, even God <S%G2316><s%>, who giveth life <S%G2227><s%> to the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> calleth <S%G2564><s%> the things that are <S%G5607><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> though they were <S%G5607><s%>.

Who <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> against <S%G3844><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, to the end that <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> that which had been spoken <S%G2046><s%>, So <S%G3779><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> be <S%G2071><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> being <S%G770><s%> weakened <S%G770><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> he considered2657, 3756 his own <S%G1438><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> as good as dead <S%G3499><s%> (he being about <S%G4225><s%> a hundred years old <S%G1541><s%>), and <S%G2532><s%> the deadness <S%G3500><s%> of <S%G3388><s%> Sarah <S%G4564><s%>'s womb <S%G5225><s%>;

yet <S%G1519><s%>, looking unto the promise <S%G1860><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, he wavered <S%G1252><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> through unbelief <S%G570><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> waxed strong <S%G1743><s%> through faith <S%G4102><s%>, giving <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> being fully assured <S%G4135><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he had promised <S%G1861><s%>, he was <S%G2076><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to perform <S%G4160><s%>.
<S%G2532><s%> Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> also it was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sake <S%G1223><s%> alone <S%G3440><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our sake <S%G2248><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, unto whom <S%G3739><s%> it shall <S%G3195><s%> be reckoned <S%G3049><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him that raised <S%G1453><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>,

who <S%G3739><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> up for <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> justification <S%G1347><s%>.
